function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of physical, sexual, emotional, and verbal violence due to confinement within the home during lockdowns.","Impact":"Exposure to greater risks of violence and psychological effects on victims.","Mitigation":"Provision of accessible support services and interventions to mitigate the risk.","Technologies":"Online platforms for remote counseling and reporting of violence.","People":"Previous victims of domestic violence and intimate partner violence (DV and IPV) within the home.","Owner":"Support service providers and relevant government agencies."},{"Description":"Public health emergency due to withdrawal or inability to access support services for victims of DV and IPV during lockdowns.","Impact":"Exacerbation of the public health crisis related to DV and IPV.","Mitigation":"Ensuring availability and accessibility of support services through remote and alternative means.","Technologies":"Telehealth, online counseling, and virtual support groups.","People":"Victims of DV and IPV who are unable to access traditional support services.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, support organizations, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Increased incidence of IPV during lockdowns, with economic stress and confinement at home being correlated with different types of violence.","Impact":"Economic stress and confinement together increase the likelihood of psychological abuse, sexual violence, and physical violence in the home.","Mitigation":"Providing economic relief and financial support, along with access to remote counseling and intervention services.","Technologies":"Online financial assistance platforms and remote mental health resources.","People":"Victims of IPV and couples experiencing economic stress and confinement during lockdowns.","Owner":"Government agencies, financial institutions, and mental health service providers."}]}
